title: Stoa of Zeus (Eleutherios)
description: The Stoa of Zeus Eleutherios was built on the west side of the Agora of Athens between 430-425 BC, in honor of Zeus "of Freedom"; the stoa, Doric in its external order, housed the shields of Athenians who had died fighting for the city.

properties.description: Representative point location for the Stoa of Zeus Eleutherios in the Agora of Athens. Coordinates derived from Google Earth imagery.
properties.title: Imagery Location of the Stoa of Zeus (Eleutherios)
